<section begin="Desc" />Players will often find '''Common Enemies''' in the open world while exploring, or in [[Domain]]s and [[Spiral Abyss]]. These enemies may occasionally drop [[Character and Weapon Enhancement Material]]s.<section end="Desc" /> They always drop a varied amount of [[Mora]] upon killing them, although usually in small amounts and provide very little [[Character EXP]].

==Respawn==
If a '''Common Enemy''' is a part of [[Elite Enemies]] spawn group, then they respawn at the same time '''Elite Enemies''' do, which is [[World Reset Timers|Daily Reset Time]] is for the player's server/region.

There is a hypothesis that each group of '''Common Enemies''' that one can encounter in the open world will respawn exactly 12 hours after the time of discovery. For example, if the player finds a group of Hilichurls and then 11 hours 50 minutes later decides to kill them and come back to the same spot after additional 10 minutes, the group will respawn. Since this is a hypothesis, it's still not proven but it's very likely to be true based on current data.<!-- ask Mcpie#8672 in Genshin Data Gathering discord server for more details - research started on 8th of March 2021 and due to long respawn times it might take a few days to finally state the end result. -->

There is also a hypothesis regarding daily kill limit yielding drops of '''2000''' '''Common Enemies'''. It is still unconfirmed, but multiple video proofs show that this might turn out to be true.<!-- ask Mcpie#8672 in Genshin Data Gathering discord server for more info - will provide a proof at around 20th of March 2021 -->
